text:
Hi <@U25PYL3Q8>,

I just stumbled accross this thread and I'm also having the issue, that my navigation menu elements don't show horizontally even though I selected the option in the menu setings.
I imported the default CSS via two lines of code into my CSS module:
{% include "HubSpot/styles/responsive/modules.css" %}
{% include "HubSpot/styles/patches/recommended.css" %}

I'd really appreciate it, if you or anybody else could help me out with this problem. Additionally, here is the preview page:
<https://app.HubSpot.com/content/8577861/edit/35905931462/preview>

Thanks in advance!
